markFilter.title: Filter Options
markFilter.emptyDesc: If you confirm that any point info is missing or incorrect, please contact the administrators in the our community, or submit an Issue on our GitHub repository.

language.title: language
language.fullSupportHint: Complete translations for both UI and in-game content.
language.uiOnlyHint: UI translations only, in-game content will be displayed in English.
language.fyi:
If your language is not yet available on this website, you can contact the site administrator via email at translate@talos.wiki, or visit GitHub to participate in our open-source translation project. You can request translation entries for your language and assist with translating and localizing the WIKI section according to our guidelines. We sincerely appreciate and look forward to your contributions.
You can also click to view the list of translation contributors.

tos.title: Terms & Storage
tos.policy:
We use Cookies to store your auto-login information; LocalStorage to store your UI preferences and marker progress; and CacheStorage to store font data and image resources for your language. These files allow you to access the website more quickly in the future and ensure the website's availability when offline.

Deleting the website's local storage can save space on your device. However, it may take longer to load these files when you visit again; if you disable website storage, the website will not be able to automatically record your data for your next use.

We do not report your data to the server, so you do not need to worry about privacy issues.

You can decide whether to enable local storage.
tos.warning:
Warning: If you clear stored data, your auto-login information, UI preferences, and marker progress will be lost; and it may take longer than usual to load the website next time.

If confirmed, please click the delete button again.

guide.welcome:
Welcome to OPEN ENDFIELD MAP.
This is your first time using this map. We will provide you with a brief guided tour to help you quickly understand the various features of the map.

You can click the 'Skip' button at any time to end the guide, or restart it from the help button in the top bar.
guide.sidebarToggle:
Click to expand the sidebar.
The sidebar includes your most frequently used marker filters and switches closely related to marker display.
guide.search: You can search for markers to view using languages supported by the game and select them in the search results.
guide.filterContainer:
Markers of the same type are grouped in a filter.
Click to expand the list of markers of that type.
guide.filterSort:
Hold the ICON on the left of the filter to enter drag mode.
You can sort the filters important to you according to your needs.
guide.selectorSelect:
Specific marker selector. Click to toggle selection status; selected markers will appear on the map.
You can see the total number of such markers in the current area, as well as the number you have marked.
guide.selectorComplete: When all markers of this type are marked as complete, the selector will change to completed status for quick judgment of marking progress.
guide.triggerHandle:
Switches related to map display are located at the bottom of the sidebar.
You can hold the mouse to drag and operate them.
guide.triggerSwitch:
Click to toggle switch status.
  • Marker Clustering Mode allows dense markers to be displayed merged;
  • Region Boundary Display highlights every sub-region and its boundaries within the current area.
guide.scale:
Use the Zoom Control to view and manipulate map zoom.
Scroll wheel or trackpad can be used to zoom. You can also zoom by clicking the +/- buttons or anywhere on the zoom bar.
guide.filterList: The Marker List lists the markers you have selected; click the icon to deselect.
guide.headbar: Switches related to map settings are located in the header bar.
guide.tos: The website's Terms of Service and Data Management.
guide.hideUI: Hide Website UI to take screenshots or view edge markers.
guide.group: View discussion groups and communities related to this project.
guide.darkMode: Toggle the current ambient light mode.
guide.language:
Switch interface language.
Currently, languages with full game content translation support include English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, and Korean.
Languages with interface translation support also include French, German, Italian, Russian, Spanish, Indonesian, Portuguese, Arabic, Thai, and Vietnamese.
guide.regionSwitch: Click to switch between different sandbox maps (main regions) in the game.
guide.subregionSwitch:
Hover over the main region icon to show available sub-regions; clicking a sub-region icon will jump to that sub-region view.
Similarly, you can also select a layer for a region.
guide.pointSelect: Click a marker to enter selected status. You will be able to view the marker's information.
guide.pointMark: Click the marker again to mark it as complete.
guide.detail: You can view specific information about the selected marker, including the number of markers of this type in all regions, the current main region, and the current sub-region.
guide.pointIcon: Clicking the marker icon can also mark it as complete.
